abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers beat Tampa Bay Lightning, 5-2, ending eight-game losing streak on road.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers scored three goals in the third period, including two empty-netters, to stop their road losing streak.

headline.main: Rangers Beat Lightning to End 8-Game Road Skid
headline.print_headline: Rangers Beat Lightning to End 8-Game Road Skid

snippet: The Rangers scored three goals in the third period, including two empty-netters, to stop their road losing streak.
